house_listing.house_description: 2 car + garage, kitchen open to family rm.Nice open foyercrown mold&chairrail where shown. Swirl ceil in dr, curio in fr. Walk in closet in master, w/vault ceiling & plantshelf mstr bath has vanity,garden tub & walk in shower.Bedrms 2 & 3 have walk-in closets,utility rm up.Williamsburg model #460
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Attic Fan, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Foyer, Utility Room,Walk-In Closet(s)
